_meta.title: Business Profile Survey
_meta.description: Capture inputs for building a Business Profile

questions.label: What is your tagline or one-liner?
questions.hint: A concise statement of what you do
questions.placeholder: e.g., Production-grade AI assistants for businesses tired of chatbot theater

questions.label: How do you position your business?
questions.hint: 2-3 sentences describing what you do and why it matters
questions.placeholder: e.g., I build AI assistants that actually work in production—handling real customer questions, reducing support load, and converting website visitors—without hallucination risks or performance disasters.

questions.label: What perspective do you use in brand communications?
What is your primary offer?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Clarity Sprint - A 3-5 day scoping engagement that produces a buildable plan before you commit serious budget

questions.label: What is the typical price for your primary offer?
What other offers do you have?
questions.hint: List other products, services, or packages
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Implementation Package ($8K-$18K)
Monthly Retainer ($1,500-$4,000/mo)
Training Workshop ($2,500)

questions.label: What is your primary pricing model?
Why should someone choose you over alternatives?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Fortune 500 discipline without enterprise bureaucracy. 17 years of execution experience applied to SMB budgets.

questions.label: What specific things do you do differently?
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Clarity before tools - I won't recommend a solution until I understand your problem
Production-grade by default - Every build includes guardrails and monitoring

questions.label: What proof points support your credibility?
questions.placeholder:
e.g., 17 years Fortune 500 IT leadership
8 years profitable solopreneur
5-star client reviews

questions.label: How do you deliver your services?
questions.placeholder: e.g., English-first project management for speed. Fixed-scope engagements with clear milestones. Direct access to senior expertise throughout.

questions.label: What is your typical project timeline?
What are your typical payment terms?
How do you compare to common alternatives?
questions.placeholder:
e.g., vs Agencies: No account managers, you work directly with me
vs Freelancers: I bring enterprise governance discipline
vs DIY: You get a proven system, not a science project

questions.label: Who is NOT a good fit for your services?
questions.hint: Customers you explicitly don't serve well
questions.placeholder:
e.g., Companies looking for the cheapest option
Teams expecting fully autonomous AI with no oversight
Clients who view consultants as vendors to squeeze on price

questions.label: What is your primary call to action?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Book a free 20-minute Clarity Call

questions.label: What do people get from taking this action?
questions.hint: The promise or outcome of responding to your CTA
questions.placeholder: e.g., We'll diagnose your situation, identify if AI is the right move, and outline next steps. No pitch deck. No commitment.

questions.label: What is your booking or contact URL?
